Section.name: About AHUU
Section.description:
Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University (AHUU), Kurnool, is a State University which was established in the recent year 2016. It is a premier Urdu University situated in the Kurnool city of Andhra Pradesh state. The University has been established by an Act of State Legislature Government of Andhra Pradesh (Act No. 13 of 2016) and duly recognized by the UGC. The State Government has allocated 144 Acres of land for the permanent site of the Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University at Orvakal on Kurnool – Nandyal highway (NH-40). The university offers various courses at Undergraduate, Integrated, and Postgraduate level apart from BA and MA in the Urdu language.
Know more about Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University Kurnool Courses & Fees
Establishment Year
2016
Type of University

Kurnool - 518002, Andhra Pradesh, India
At the university, there is a wide range of courses has been offered at the UG, PG, and Integrated levels such as the following:
All the below-listed Undergraduate courses are of 3 years of duration while the integrated ones carry 5 years duration.
All the below-written PG courses come with 2 years of duration.
Read about Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University Kurnool Fee Structure
The university is further divided into the following departments which provide the uniquely designed courses in various fields:
The university has started giving some Scholarships under the aegis of A.P. State Government Fee Reimbursement and Scholarships facility right from the day of conceptualization of the university. It covers SC/ ST/ Backward Class/ Minority/ Economically Backward Class (EBC) categories as beneficiaries for the Scholarship Programs with online scholarship portal “Jnanabhumi” of Government of Andhra Pradesh and A.P. Social Welfare Department.
The AHUUK University also provides some facilities for the students in order to confirm their ease factor at the maximum possible limit. Some of the proposed facilities are such as follows:
